title: Netflix subtitles
content: Problem with Netflix subtitles - text is duplicated and font is small. Problem specific to Firefox - no problem with Chrome or Edge. Problem specific to Netflix - no problem with e.g. Amazon Video. Problem not corrected via Netflix subtitles controls - they have no effect. Problem specific to tab view; subtitles are OK (reasonable size, no duplication) in PiP mode. Problem exists across multiple devices (laptop, desktop) running Windows 10 but no problem using TV.
creator: gaughanglent

title: firefox not opening files with registered application
content:
Firefox is forcing me to download a lot of temporary files instead of opening them in their native application, resulting in cluttering up my hard drive and making me unnecessarily having to clean up after the browser.

How can I fix this privacy invading feature?
creator: Colin.Warren
